Plugin to generate jars with module information as Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2019-05-17  | Version: 1.0
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Usage
  • FAQ
  • JavaDoc
Examples
  • Jar Example
  • Jlink Example
  • Javapackager Example

Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.mt_ag.tools.maven</groupId>
  <artifactId>jar-module-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>1.0</version>
  <type>maven-plugin</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.mt_ag.tools.maven:jar-module-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:1.0'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="com.mt_ag.tools.maven" name="jar-module-maven-plugin" rev="1.0">
  <artifact name="jar-module-maven-plugin" type="maven-plugin" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.mt_ag.tools.maven', module='jar-module-maven-plugin', version='1.0')
)

Gradle/Grails

compile 'com.mt_ag.tools.maven:jar-module-maven-plugin:1.0'

Scala SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.mt_ag.tools.maven" % "jar-module-maven-plugin" % "1.0"

Leiningen

[com.mt_ag.tools.maven/jar-module-maven-plugin "1.0"]
